blueprint.description: Installs Lollypop Music Player on Linux distros
blueprint.overview: [Lollypop](https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/Lollypop) is a lightweight modern music player designed to work excellently on the GNOME desktop environment. Lollypop also features a party mode which will automatically select party-related playlists to play; a full-screen view which lets you visually access the player from your couch thanks to its HiDPI support; and native support for replay gain.
blueprint.name: Lollypop
blueprint.title: Lollypop
